MS MCQs

    Adopt, maintain, and troubleshoot Microsoft Teams Rooms

    »

    1. Why is end user adoption important?

      To make sure users know how to use Teams Rooms to help conduct effective meetings.

      It isn’t because Teams Rooms is self-explanatory.

      So that users will know about the meeting lifecycle.


    2. Why should you routinely review the Teams Rooms equipment in your meeting rooms?

      To make sure they are showing up correctly in Teams Admin Center.

      To make sure everything is working correctly and spot any issues before it affects meetings.

      To prepare the room for the next meeting.


    3. If video and audio performance are choppy, what steps would help fix this issue?

      Add an HDMI CEC adapter.

      Use the Microsoft Teams Rooms recovery tool.

      Bypass the proxy server and disable break/inspect on Teams media traffic.
